fn.p: Authors’ addresses: Jianhai Yu, Xujuan Li, Xiaoen He, Xuling Liu, Qian Xie, Li Zhu, Fengyun Jia, Yingxue Mao, Zongqiu Chen, Ying Wen, and Bao Zhang, Guangdong Provincial Key Laboratory of Tropical Disease Research, School of Public Health, Southern Medical University, Guangzhou, China, E-mails: chienhai@163.com, murong816@outlook.com, hexiaoen24@163.com, maiblume@163.com, xiyuxie89@126.com, zhuli89@126.com, 13078431254@163.com, milyx117@163.com, harpul@sina.com, wenying@gdciq.gov.cn, and zhangb@smu.edu.cn. Zhicheng Zhong, and Danjuan Ma, Guangzhou Medical University, Guangdong Women and Children’s Hospital Guangzhou, China, E-mails: zhongyan6291@163.com and mdj0702@163.com.
